asap.visualprosody

Class VisualProsody

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.visualprosody.VisualProsody

  • public class VisualProsody
extends java.lang.Object
    Automatic, incrementally constructed head motion on the basis of speech features (pitch, energy)
    Author:
    hvanwelbergen
